entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse Please Have Covid-19 Affected people quarantine in their own car, or have them quarantine in a rented or borrowed car, have them lineup at local park, have them treated and quarantined over there! please share this information and have america protected! MAGA!
